titlestmt.titleproper: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1
A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1 FA781

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:41:52 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United States. Office of the Vice President

physdesc.extent: 17 legal document boxes, 1 half legal document box, 1 flat file

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: These records are in two subseries, 1-Events and 2-Vice Presidential Staff Correspondence.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Rockefeller Archive Center has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them, and has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Types of records include: correspondence, travel logs, brochures and pamphlets, photographs, newspaper articles, and guest lists.

did.unittitle: Events

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Nelson A. Rockefeller's itinerary as Vice President of the United States during the years 1975-1976
